servicedescription: Testwebservice with a Triple Store backend

datasets.query: SELECT ?cityLabel ?coord_geom WHERE{ ?city wdt:P31 wd:Q515 . ?city wdt:P625 ?coord_geom . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } }
datasets.name: WikidataCity

datasets.query: SELECT ?namedplace ?wkt_geom WHERE{ ?namedplace rdf:type gn:NamedPlace . ?namedplace geo:hasGeometry ?coord_geom . ?coord_geom geo:asWKT ?wkt_geom . }
datasets.name: NamedPlace
